Text: For California Residents: Opt out of the sale or sharing of personal information
Label: Description of Right to Opt-out of sale of PI

Text: Welcome to our portal for submitting California Consumer Privacy Act of 2018 (as amended by the California Privacy Rights Act of 2020, and its implementing regulations, collectively, "CCPA") requests to opt out of the sale and/or sharing of your personal information. This form provides a way for individuals (like you, or, where required by law, someone you authorize, also known as an ‘authorized agent‘) to request us to not sell or share your personal information to third parties.
Label: Description of Right to Opt-out of sale of PI

Text: You may request that we not "sell" or "share" your personal information on a going forward basis.
Label: Description of Right to Opt-out of sale of PI

Label: Description of Right to Opt-out of sale of PI

Text: This form provides a way for individuals (like you, or, where required by law, someone you authorize, also known as an ‘authorized agent‘) to request us to not sell or share your personal information to third parties.
Label: Methods to exercise rights

Text: You may request that we not "sell" or "share" your personal information on a going forward basis. Please keep in mind that if you exercise your right to opt out of the sale or sharing of your personal information, you may still see ads on our publisher's sites, and some data collection will still take place (for example, to detect or prevent fraud or deliver the services you request from us).
Label: Description of Right to Opt-out of sale of PI
